0: Hotel staff was very friendly even sent up a nice note and box of chocolates to congratulate us
The service is friendly and the coffee is on the house
Staff was very nice and genuine
Clean nice staff convenient luggage storage and use of clean bathrooms once checked out
Very quiet clean and staff was amazing
the staff were very helpful when I was taken ill
The staff went over and beyond my expectations
1: We usually arrive before check in and leave our bags with the concierge
But the hotel staff is very friendly and the building is historic but beautiful
2: Was switched from a King to a Queen room without my knowledge then had issues with the night staff not fulfilling requests
The Desk staff was not always available or there to answer the phone and our bags almost did not make it to the ship on time
Asked the front the desk for help in directing us to the midst do while in the island and she seem lost and confused
Shout out to the staff helping with luggage
We put the do not disturb sign on the door when we were in the room for a few minutes because we saw the maid staff st a room near ours
Also no chair in room to sit at desk
They are closing in a couple of months and will be closed for 2 years so they are probably cutting down on staff

Also I slipped in the shower and hit my head on the sink and when I reported it to the front desk staff there was basically no response I had to insist upon an accident report be filled out to cover both myself and the hotel in case any additional problems were to occur due to my head injury
The staff was acomodatingThe hotel is so old and worn down
